entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 19.
